Package com.philips.pins.shinelib.capabilities

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SHNCapabilityBattery
    Interface to get battery level from a peripheral and subscribe for battery level change notifications.
    SHNCapabilityBattery.SHNCapabilityBatteryListener
    Interface to receive notifications for battery level changes.
    SHNCapabilityDataStreaming
    Interface to receive a stream of SHNData objects from a peripheral.
    SHNCapabilityDataStreaming.SHNCapabilityDataStreamingListener
    Interface containing the callback through which received streaming events are reported.
    SHNCapabilityDeviceDiagnostics
    Interface to receive a peripheral specific diagnostic information.
    SHNCapabilityDeviceInformation
    Device information provides information such as described by SHNCapabilityDeviceInformation.SHNDeviceInformationType.
    SHNCapabilityDeviceInformation.Listener
    Callback interface for SHNCapabilityDeviceInformation.readDeviceInformation(SHNDeviceInformationType, Listener).
    SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate
    Interface to upload and deploy firmware to a peripheral.
    SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate.SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener
    Interface to receive results of firmware upload and deploy.
    SHNCapabilityLogSynchronization
    Interface to obtain the log of new measurements from a peripheral.
    SHNCapabilityLogSynchronization.SHNCapabilityLogSynchronizationListener
    Interface used to receive notifications about ongoing synchronization.
    SHNCapabilityUserConfiguration Deprecated
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SHNCapabilityDeviceInformation.SHNDeviceInformationType
    Supported device information types.
    SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate.SHNFirmwareUpdateState
    Possible states of the firmware update capability.
    SHNCapabilityLogSynchronization.Option
    Possible options for log synchronization.
    SHNCapabilityLogSynchronization.State
    Possible synchronization states.
